name: Target Game
description:
This game is called Target Game. You have to click on the targets to earn points. Each red target is worth one point. If you get 5 points, a golden target will appear, and it is worth 5 points. If you get 20 points, a boss target will appear. 

Credits: 

spookymodem made the glass breaking sound: https://opengameart.org/content/breaking-bottle

Alexandr Zhelanov made the background music: https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Ogrebane made the boss target sound: https://opengameart.org/content/guttural-vocals
